author: Rimon Dutta
title: How LLMs Are Changing the Way We Work and Create
text: AI is evolving fast, and at the center of this change are Large Language Models (LLMs)â€”tools that can understand and generate human-like language. You may have already seen them in action through tools like ChatGPT or AI chatbots on websites.
